biotools.summary: The ECR (Evolutionary Conserved Regions) browser is a web-based tool for visualizing and navigating through whole genome alignments of several vertebrate species.  Users can also submit sequences for alignment with one of the genomes represented.

bioschemas.name: ECR Browser
bioschemas.summary: The ECR (Evolutionary Conserved Regions) browser is a web-based tool for visualizing and navigating through whole genome alignments of several vertebrate species.  Users can also submit sequences for alignment with one of the genomes represented.
